title: (x) "Phase X Records" tech sans - OCR-A {Claas Philipp Bischof}
content:
[http://www.phasexrecords.co.uk/images/forum/forum\_header.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080725000155/http:/www.phasexrecords.co.uk/images/forum/forum_header.jpg "http://www.phasexrecords.co.uk/images/forum/forum\_header.jpg")

Please could you tell me what the font on this picture is. We need it for a forum on our website. Thanks.

 [‹ (x) "Earthfully Yours" casual script - Clarissa {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080725000155/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28872 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Jones New York logo - Optima {Simon Duckworth} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080725000155/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28869 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Liquidfunk

comments.content:
OCR A. you can get it here:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/ocr-a/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080725000155/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/ocr-a/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/ocr-a/")
